toolswap.warning: NO EMPTY SLOT FOR SAVING BREAKING TOOL
toolswap.configuration.min_durability: Minimum durability for tools to be saved
toolswap.configuration.ignore_harvest_le: Ignore harvest level when swapping tools
toolswap.configuration.ignore_empty_hand: Mode for swapping with tools in hand
toolswap.configuration.min_durability.to: Set the minimum durability a tool must have to be saved when it's about to break.
toolswap.configuration.one_block_mode.to: Enable this to continuously search for the best tool while mining.
toolswap.configuration.sorttype.tooltip:
Choose how tools are sorted for selection:
LEVEL = sorted by harvest level, lowest first
LEVEL_INVERTED = sorted by harvest level, highest first
LEFT_TO_RIGHT = sorted from left to right
RIGHT_TO_LEFT = sorted from right to left
ENCHANTED_FIRST = enchanted tools are prioritized
ENCHANTED_LAST = unenchantable tools are prioritized
toolswap.configuration.save.tooltip: Enable this to save tools with low durability while breaking blocks.
Enable this to prevent tool swapping while sneaking.
toolswap.configuration.title: ToolSwap
toolswap.configuration.ignore_harvest_le: Enable this to ignore harvest levels when selecting tools.
toolswap.configuration.ignore_empty_hand:
Choose when tools can swap based on items in your hand:
ALWAYS = Always swap
EMPTY_HAND = Only swap if your hand is empty
ITEMS = Swap if holding an item
TOOLS = Swap if holding a tool
NO_TOOLS = Swap only if holding a non-tool item
